TopicTitle: Top Game (A Top Gear Parody) - Race To Los Santos Airport | Season Finale !

Articles.Content:
Here is the last Episode of the series, number 10 of Top Gear in Game! This is the Top Gear parody in game! Tonight, Jezz and James race to Los Santos Airport, take an SLS round our track and even have a Little 'Good News!' All in this little parody of Top Gear!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8jDWCDnaGj8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Please let me know what can be improved
